1221.content:
Inside the house of miss Rabbit. Cream is about to have her breakfast. But not the usual grub, as her mother, (named Vanilla, by the way), forgot to visit the supermarket. But don't worry, dear Cream, your mother got something else that is just as yummy. After all, breakfast is too important for all little tummies.

Crem asked, "Mommy, what are we having for breakfast today?"
Vanilla finishing up whatever it is and begins to heat it up. She replies, "Something called a breakfast burrito."
Cream wondering, "What's a burrito?"
Vanillia said, "It's some sort of food that wrapped in and inside it has some important breakfast stuff like eggs, beans and cheese."
Cream shocked, she said,"My Cheese?!"
Vanilla responded, "No, not your chao, sweetie. I mean the yellow square with holes in it."
"Oh, I knew that." Cream said relieved.
The burrito was done, and Vanilla puts it on the plate. As she carried it over to the table Vanilla said, "Anyway, I figured that it would be a good idea if this would be served for breakfast."
Cream looked at the burrito with uncertainty, "Uh.. I don't know... can I get some cereal instead, please."
Vanilla said, "Ohhh, I'm sorry honey, mommy forgot to go get some from the store."
Cream still looked at it with uncertainty, "But it looks weird."
Vanilla felt bad about this but, this is all that she can serve her daughter at the moment till she make her store run, "Don't knock it till you try it, sweetie. Besides what else could you be eating for breakfast?"

Cream may as well try it, lest she stay hungry. "How bad could it be." She tasted it and *drum roll* it was quite ...yummy! She enjoyed this weird food, an unusually good start to her breakfast. Though unaware to miss Cream, this could come with some really nasty side effects.

Shadow sighed in contentment as his usually stoic expression curved into a small smirk. He leaned back, crossing his arms behind his head. Rouge smiled herself, tightened her arms around his neck, burying her face into his snow white chest fur.

Indeed, it was a night of passion for the two. Dim candlelight illuminated the dark bathroom with the help of a full moon's glow, a scent of lavender and vanilla filling the air and piping hot water and a batch of bubbles embracing Shadow and Rouge in the nude. Rouge lifted her head from Shadow's chest and looked into his crimson red eyes, and he into her turquoise eyes.

“Oh, Shadow - I'm so just glad we can finally have a night to ourselves.”

“Indeed. That mission of yours took away our time last week...was it for?”

Rouge blinked and, even though the lighting was dim, Shadow could've sworn her cheeks were burning red. “Ah...that. It was a blast! Erm, that is to say, it left me without a second wind. I was only looking for my usual bounty and then GUN called - they wanted me to look into a new natural gas resource halfway across the nation. Yeah.”

Shadow nodded. “Hhmph. As if GUN needs any more gas guzzling tanks...”

Rouge smiled, glad Shadow got off topic. “It's alright, diamond, I'm here now...” She cooed as she toyed with his chest hair.

Shadow finally grinned. “I've noticed.” He flung his arms around her, dragging her close and pressed his lips against hers. He glossed his hand over her curved back, and even had the courage to grope her voluminous buttock.

Rouge held back a gasp, her eyes widening, letting it die in her throat. Oh no...! An ominous gurgle churned in her stomach. Her final grumble fruit fueled fart lied in her intestines...the hot hedgehog before her and the relaxing bath water weren't helping. And the bubbles were almost gone

Rouge gritted her teeth and let out a sigh of defeat. “Shadow, I -- need to show you this.” She pointed a finger towards her beau. “Yes. Pull it. You may want to take your hand off my back...”

PPPPFFFTTTHHHhhbrrRrTphftt

15512.content:
It was a truly beautiful day, the sun was shining bright in the sky, there was no robots or monsters attacking the city, and almost the entire city was gathered in the city's town hall eagerly waiting for the arrival of the extremely talented singer Mina mongoose. Walking around town to calm her nerves for her big performance was Mina herself. looking quite down on herself the mongoose began to mumble to herself. "oooh, there's just no way I'm ready for this big of a show." Mina says as she hangs her head downward, truly worried that she'll end up failing miserably at her show. Walking down the street that would take her back to town hall Mina notices a small shop like shack in the middle of the ally way. Quite curious with the shop Mina decides to take a small peek into the shack,

"Hello is anyone in here?" Mina begins walking slowly around the store seeing as there isn't much space to walk in it. Approaching the front Mina rings a little bell to see if anyone would come up to her. To her surprise a grotesque looking rat jumps up from behind the counter startling Mina. "Welcome dear. How may I assist you?..." The rat says moving his head closer To Minas. "H-Help me? Oh no I-I-I was just looking around that's all,okayseeyaby-" Mina begins to say as she begins to run out of the store only to be stopped by the rat man who somehow made his way in front of her. "Now now what's the rush mrs." the mysterious man begins to gently push Mina back into his store. " Have a gander around, maybe you'll find something you want." The man said as he walks around his store.

"uuuuh I don't think you have what I need, I kinda need to find that on my own." Mina says to the man who just smugs at her. "Oooh I'm sure I have something that could help you." The man says beginning to walk back behind his counter. "Just tell me what you need and I'll look around to see if I have anything." Mina thinks deeply on the mans words despite the fact there would be no way he could give her the confidence she needed to preform her concert. "Well I you see I'm in a band and I'm kinda ner-" Mina was cut off by the man immediately. "Say no more mrs!" said the man going into the back of his shop only to bring out a rather large container with a weird red colored liquid in it. "This here drink will give you the boost you need definitly."

Looking at the container Mina grows suspicious of the drink. "what is it." The man looking down at Mina can't help but smile hearing her ask. "an old family recipe" the man replied. "it gives whoever drinks it a huge confidence boost." Mina thought why the man would give her such a thing but time was running short and Mina needed to go. "alright I guess I can give it a try." the man smiles again pouring Mina a small glass of his family's concoction while also pouring some into a much smaller, carry sized container. Mina drinks the mans strange yet surprisingly tasty drink, almost tasting like cherry's. yet she felt slightly air headed from the drink and small gurgles coming from her stomach. the man hands Mina the smaller container quite eagerly to her. "on the house, just for you my new friend." Hearing this Mina already began feeling much confident in herself, as if she could handle three different concerts in a row. "Thank you for everything mister!" Mina says running out of the store with more gurgles coming from her stomach. "come back any time... My new gassy friend." the man said with a grim growing on his face.

Running as fast as she could back to the concert Mina goes back behind the stage approaching her manager, an old, sleezy crow. "where've you been Mina, your goin on stage in 5 minutes, you've never been this late!" the crow said with anger in his throat. "I know I just had to clear my head that's all." Mina says getting into her dress preparing to preform. "Your lucky you've got a great voice and a great looks or I swear." the crow trail's off as Mina gets ready feeling even more spacey and even louder gurgles from her stomach. "I'm ready!" info.brief_description: All your favorite Sonic girls get gassy!
info.description:
This is an interactive story where Sonic girls such as Amy, Cream, Blaze, Rouge, Vanilla, and more get gassy! All you had to do is choose a girl and how they will end up trumpeting!

RULES:

-There must be at least two options for every addition. You are allowed to end the story at some point, preferably with one giant fart or something like that, but please do not force a reader to go one way or else the story will end early.
-Even if you choose only one specific girl, you are allowed to have more than one girl get gassy too. But try to focus on the girl you chose.
-You cannot choose Males or make Males an option if there's ever an "Other" option!
-Burping is allowed.
-Sexuality/Nudity is allowed.
-Gore/Death is not allowed!
-Personally I don't feel too good about allowing expansions, growth, or anything like that, but if you feel like doing it, then do it. But keep it at a minor level. I don't want it to go too far.
-THE MOST IMPORTANT RULE: All stories must start with the girl you chose farting and there must be a reason for it. But if you want, feel free to just say that a particular girl is gassy at first, but you seriously must give a reason why. And don't forget to keep this farting thing going strong. I don't want anyone to get bored and neither do you.

Good luck! Do not write anything that I feel is bad or has nothing to do with the story or I will get it edited/deleted.
